text: Basi ni wam’bichilile jumpepe mwa (achakongwe) wawili wala, junankwenda mwasonisoni. (Jwankongwe) jwatite: “Chisimu atati wangu akum’bilanga kuti akan’dipile malipilo ga kutumwechesya uwwe (ilango yetu).” Basi ndema ja wam’bichilile (Shuaibu) ni kunsimbila abali, jwalakwe jwatite: “Nkajogopa, n’jokweche ku wandu walupuso.”
